skills.name: Goka Fire
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 20s] Unleash the true powers of Shamash by consuming one's life force. Hits using the character's Basic, Combo, Charged, and Ultimate ATKs will deal an additional 500 Fire DMG. CD: 0.3s. After using the skill, lose 2% Max HP per second. If current HP is below 50%, lose 1% Max HP per second instead. Duration: 10s. Character will not die from the skill.

skills.name: Nirvana
skills.description: Character gains 13.0% Total DMG Multiplier. At below 50% Max HP, character gains 15% Total DMG Reduction and heals 15.0 HP/s.

skills.name: Key of Destruction
skills.description: In co-op raids, team attacks gain 20.0% Total DMG Multiplier and the team heals for 7.0% HP for 5.1s whenever a character uses a weapon skill.
